Package com.vsta.model

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.vsta.model.User
@Entity
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a user account of the application, with the information provided by the user. The user could be either registered or a registering user.

    Constructs a new User object.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User​(int id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Constructs a new User object. This is when name, email and password are specified at registration.
      Parameters:
      id - ID to uniquely identify a User.
      name - The name to identify the User.
      email - Email specified by the User at registration.
      password - Password specified by the User.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the ID of the User.
      Returns:
      This User's ID.

      public void setEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Overwrites the email of this User.
      Parameters:
      email - This User's email.

    • getPassword

      public java.lang.String getPassword()
      Gets the password of the User.
      Returns:
      This User's password. Password should be hashed, and has been validated to be not blank.

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword​(java.lang.String password)
      Overwrites the password of this User.
      Parameters:
      password - This User's password. Password should be hashed and has been validated to be not blank.

    • setHashedPassword

      public void setHashedPassword​(java.lang.String password)
      Custom method to hash the given password then use it to overwrite the password of this user.
      Parameters:
      password - This User's password. Password can be plaintext, and has been validated to be not blank. It is vital to be not blank as otherwise it will be encoded as well, which is misleading and exposes the account to security issues.

    • getToken

      public java.lang.String getToken()
      Gets the password reset token of the User.
      Returns:
      This User's token.

    • setToken

      public void setToken​(java.lang.String token)
      Overwrites the password reset token of this User.
      Parameters:
      token - This User's token.

    • setToken

      public void setToken()
      Custom method to create and set a random UUID as the token for reset password requests.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object object)
      Override equals method to compare two Users.
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
      Parameters:
      object - Object that could be of User type or otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if both objects are the same or have the same ID

      false if object is null or not User type or both objects have different ID
